comment.author: 81027958@N07
comment._content: This is F-6D s/n 44-14841 flown by Maj. Shomo. The photo must have been taken sometime after his Medal of Honor Mission, when the crew names under the starboard cockpit and name 'Snooks 5th' on the nose were added, and the tactical number '66' repainted into two colour variant. The crew chief, S/Sgt Ralph Winkel, is sitting in the cockpit.
